description: an adversary may trick an authenticated or trusted victim into leaking sensitive data on their behalf

1: adversary crafts an exploit for leaking a secret value from a vulnerable website
adversary uploads the exploit to a malicious website
bob logs in to the vulnerable website (bob is authenticated - session cookie is saved)
adversary tricks bob into clicking on the malicious website
bob clicks on the malicious website
bob's browser loads the session cookie and performs reveal the secret value

redemption: avoid sensitive inside javascript and json
